messages.title: About James Bellis
messages.content: James Bellis, local Vauxhall resident, is your Prospective Conservative candidate for Vauxhall.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: James is opposed to the planned £40 million footbridge from Pimlico to Nine Elms.
He is fighting for cleaner air in Vauxhall by investing in electric car charging points and opposing the congestion charge extension.

issues.environment: Investing in electric car charging points, opposing congestion charge extension.

housing.content: Opposed to the planned £40 million footbridge from Pimlico to Nine Elms.

leaflet.personalStatement: For a strong and effective MP who will be accountable to you, vote James Bellis on May 5th.
leaflet.additionalNotes: James lives in Vauxhall (Oval), has also lived in Clapham, Brixton and Kennington. He is a local charity trustee and runs a small business.
